member.name: T:DecalUtils.WBIDecal
member.summary: This was originally a name-tag module for changing the names of the Heisenberg airships. Now it's adapted for decals in general.

member.name: F:DecalUtils.WBIDecal.decalURL
member.summary: URL to the image that's displayed by the decal.

member.name: F:DecalUtils.WBIDecal.isVisible
member.summary: Flag to indicate whether or not the decal is visible

member.name: F:DecalUtils.WBIDecal.alwaysVisible
member.summary: Override flag to ensure that the decal is always visible.

member.name: F:DecalUtils.WBIDecal.updateSymmetry
member.summary: Flag to indicate if the decal updates symmetry parts

member.name: F:DecalUtils.WBIDecal.toggleDecalName
member.summary: GUI name for button that toggles decal visibility

member.name: F:DecalUtils.WBIDecal.selectDecalName
member.summary: GUI name for button that selects the decal.

member.name: F:DecalUtils.WBIDecal.decalTransforms
member.summary: List of transforms that will be changed by the decal. Separate names by semicolon

member.name: M:DecalUtils.WBIDecal.onFlagSelected(FlagBrowser.FlagEntry)
member.summary: Private event handler to respond to flag selection.

member.name: M:DecalUtils.WBIDecal.updateSymmetryParts
member.summary: Updates symmetry parts with the new decal

member.name: M:DecalUtils.WBIDecal.ChangeDecal
member.summary: Changes the decal on all named transforms.
